entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload clean` fail after 8.0.400 #107233

Closed

  • [Perf] Regressions on System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Cache #106346
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move TLS tests to unsupported list #107236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve code coverage for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #107235
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove O(N) List<T>.RemoveAt from RegexCache.Add #106581
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Handle exceptional cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix RunClassConstructor trim warning for Nullable<T> #107039
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix encoding for certain k-mask instructions #107210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make `DomainAssembly` create its `Assembly` in its constructor and remove separate allocate load level #107224
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    area-Build-mono
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add test coverage for DirectoryServices.TransformControls #107201
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2528686 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
